pages.text: The wrench has two modes.$(br)$(li)Wrench mode: open a node GUI with right-click. Shift-right-click removes that node.$(li)Copy-Paste mode: copy and paste full node setups.$(br2)To change modes, hold Shift and scroll while the wrench is in your hand.

pages.title: Copy/Paste Node Config
pages.text: Switch to Copy-Paste mode first.$(br)$(li)Right-click a node to copy its full config into the wrench clipboard.$(li)Shift-right-click another node to paste.$(br2)You can also right-click in air to open the clipboard editor. Shift-right-click in air shows a quick clipboard preview in chat.

pages.title: Paste Fail Cases
pages.text: Paste can fail, and the game tells you why.$(br)$(li)Clipboard is empty.$(li)Clipboard data is invalid.$(li)Target node is incompatible.$(li)Missing required items in your inventory (needed filters/upgrades are not there).$(li)Not enough free inventory space for items that get returned during paste.$(br2)If paste succeeds, the node config and network link are applied.
